Key Match Events: The White Sox rallied for five runs in the ninth inning to win the game
Post-Match Reflections: Grady Sizemore stated that the White Sox played clean and competitive baseball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Korey Lee threw out Trevor Story as he tried to steal second in the third inning
Dominic Fletcher hit a crucial RBI single in the ninth inning
Others: Chris Flexen ended a historic streak of 20 consecutive losses for the White Sox
Fletcher discussed the difficulty of seeing the seams in the batter's box due to shadows
